review: Doctor was very friendly and cleared all my doubts with smile. Really felt he is a very good Doctor and a very good human being
I injured my knee and was thinking something severe, but the doctor cleared explained and gave medication accordingly. ** *********** ********** **** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Lower Back Pain,Joint and Muscle Problems,
review: He has saved my life. I was wrongly treated for arthritis by a popular specialist in bangalore and I was almost bed ridden when my father took me to his doctor - Dr Sanjay Prasad Hegde. Dr Hegde had already treated my father's knee problem - avoided knee replacement surgery, and got him to be normal in 6 months. I was also treated with food, rest and supplements alone and a detailed dos and don'ts to get normal from the joints issue I had. He is very lively caring Doctor who simplifies the problem for a patient. He also accurately diagnoses what the problem is. If we simply adopt the suggestions he guides to get over with the problem, then we are sorted. I recommended Dr Hegde to many people and everyone had tremendous recovery. I also depend on Dr Hegde for other doctors reference because of the immense faith in his knowledge and kindness. We need more doctors like him in the world.

** ** * ********* It’s been 6 months after my ACL and I am almost back to sports. Last week had an intense back pain, many said it’s slip disk, he nullified everything and treated me for back muscle sprain. I back to normal from yesterday.
Doctor was very friendly and cleared all my doubts with smile. Really felt he is a very good Doctor and a very good human being
I injured my knee and was thinking something severe, but the doctor cleared explained and gave medication accordingly. ** *********** ********** **** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My mother visited Dr Sanjay for her knee and shoulder pain, but in two minutes he gave his judgement that you have to go for surgery. He also ignored the shoulder pain and keep on stressing on surgery.
******* ** *** * ***** patient tend to get scared thinking of surgery, it's doctors responsibility to explain the whole process and give confidence that they have capability to improve the life of patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was extremely friendly and thorough knowledge of ailment being faced by my mother. However these good things of doctor were nullified by the hospital staff management who made us wait for more tan 1 hour. if you are planning to visit the doctor expect a time frame of 2 to 3 hours in hospital.
